div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

I have a passionate teacher in finance who loves what he does, he persuade us when i was in a master degree at university of Dschang, to read a fantastic book call "pension plan" book.This book is interessant because it permit me to learn many things about retirement and how the government treat our salaries so that when you are a retire personn you don't have a problem to survive in our society. i am happy today because i have the insurance that when you work you can be sure to have something when you loss your job or when you are a retire person and how to calculate it.Thanks to him
